name: Fighter of Eve Demo
description:
Once upon a time there way a small town. The town was hidden in a large valley in between two great mountains. That village was called "Eve". It wasn't a very big town. Maybe only around 60 people lived there, but they had everything they needed and they were happy.

But on one day, an evil force called "Nitram" attacked the town and the surrounding forests.

Nitram terrorized the villagers and they saw no other way, than to leave. Most of the people evacuated the village and left to a, what they thought, "safe place" through the cave.

Nitram started summoning strange creatures and they swiftly took over the whole valley. Only a small amount of people managed to leave the cave fast enough. The rest got caught by the creatures.

No one could stop the creatures. All hope was lost. While the people tried to fight against the creatures, Nitram began building a lair on top of one of the great mountains.

That's where your story begins!

You were out traveling when Nitram attacked and return not knowing anything about it. You wonder why everyone is gone.

You feel like something is wrong and you get your trustly old sword and shield.

You prepare yourself for another great adventure!

Minimum:

CPU: Anything released in the past 15 years will do

RAM: 3GB

GPU: Anything with least 1gb of VRAM will do.

1GB free disk space (rough assumption. Game might not be as large in the end.)
